version_description:
∙ Minor bug fixes.
∙ Added aiming sensitivity to players profile.
∙ Added sensitivity toggle icon to game controls.

∙ Minor bug fixes.
∙ Added aiming sensitivity to players profile.
∙ Added sensitivity toggle icon to game controls.

∙ General bug fixes.
∙ Fixed errors in US 10 Ball rules.

∙ General bug fixes.
∙ Fixed errors in US 10 Ball rules.
∙ Minor bug fixes.
∙ Minor bug fixes.

∙ Transfer player profiles and achievements between devices.
∙ Play online quickly using Guest Account sign in (No registration needed).
∙ Online instant messaging between registered friends.
∙ Ability to congratulate opponent when playing online games.
∙ Minor bug fixes.

∙ Graphical updates

∙ Changed online play shot timer
∙ Improved online play game selection
∙ Additional snooker ball set
∙ Full ball guides allowed in online games

∙ Play 6 Red Ball Snooker and 15 Red Ball Snooker based on WPBAS rules.

∙ Optimised for 60 Hz (With option for legacy 30 Hz).
∙ Compatibility support for iOS 12.
∙ Graphics using Metal API.
∙ Compatibility support for iPad Pro devices.
∙ Addition of new UK Pool Ball set.
∙ Addition of new US Pool Ball set.
∙ Addition of training Cue ball.
∙ Addition of 9ft Pool table for Pool game modes.
∙ Addition of Chinese 8-Ball table.
∙ Reduced pocket bounce.
∙ Added free play reward system for Tournaments and Leagues.
∙ Game play enhancements.
∙ Bug fixes.

∙ Ball Control view remembers preferred camera setting.
∙ Play shot from the Ball Control view.
∙ Replay previous shot in Practice mode.
∙ Position cue ball in Practice mode.
∙ Re-position ball in hand.
∙ Re-select nominated pocket.
∙ Online play runs at 60 Hz.
∙ Additional options for Online game creation.
∙ Fine Tune mode remembers setting per player.
∙ Additional Pool ball sets.
∙ Additional Snooker ball sets.
∙ Additional Cues.
∙ Touching Balls rule in Snooker.
∙ Foul and Miss rule in Snooker.
∙ Updated computer opponents.
